scripts.vers:prerelease: npm version prerelease  && conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s -r 0 && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "build(*): CHANGELOG UPDATE" && git push origin HEAD
scripts.vers:prepatch: npm version prepatch && conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s -r 0 && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "build(*): CHANGELOG UPDATE" && git push origin HEAD
scripts.vers:patch: npm version patch && conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s -r 0 && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "build(*): CHANGELOG UPDATE" && git push origin HEAD
scripts.vers:minor: npm version minor && conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s -r 0 && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "build(*): CHANGELOG UPDATE" && git push origin HEAD
scripts.vers:major: npm version major && conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s -r 0 && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "build(*): CHANGELOG UPDATE" && git push origin HEAD
